title: How to get my essays evaluated during IELTS writing practice - Quora

response.answer_text: Online tutors are available who evaluate your essays for a price. Before you start writing your essays, go through the online resources that are available for free, take down tips and vocabulary. Not to be trapped in plagiarism, have a writing style of your own. Ensure your task response is adequate (answer all parts of the question/rubric). Your grammar should be reasonably good (particularly the Articles and Prepositions), use simple, compound and complex sentences, reasonably good vocabulary and collocations avoiding repetition of words and ideas, have appropriate connectors between paragraphs( 3–4 at least) and conclude by restating your thesis statement. This should fetch you 7+ without a doubt. All the best,

IELTS needs a lot of training and in general with essays, so you making a good question. When I was readying for that, I was using proofreading on this site http://writemypaper.today/do-essay.php. Sometimes I even ordered their essays on some topics to see, how to write it professionally and studied on examples. You need to write a lot on very different topics. Try to maximally expand your lexicon too, it’s very important.
